message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob! You can have a small share, but I'll take the majority. Consider it a good starting point.
You're being too greedy, Alice! I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of!
Not bad, Bob, but I can do better than that. I'm not giving up yet!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. Let's split it roughly 55/45. It's a fair deal, don't you think?
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'll give you a small share, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
Not bad, Bob, but I'm not giving up yet. I think I can do better than that. You're getting a bit too greedy, don't you think?
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm still willing to make a fair deal. Let's split it 58/42. It's a reasonable compromise, don't you think?
